reviewText: I LOVE these REAL LIFE GANGSTERS Videos, this one "JUST US" is a great gangsta/drug dealing/prison movie and a killer soundtrack CD with the BOSSES of HIP HOP, SNOOP DOGG, E-40, TOO SHORT, YUKMOUTH, KEAK DA SNEAK, MISTAH FAB, RICHIE RICH,MAC DRE & more writing songs specifically for the movie!  Recommend THIS ONE, as Richard Pryor said "You go down to the courts looking for JUSTICE, that ALL you find is JUST US!"
